headline: Ancient Cataclysms and Elite Bunkers
article: A discussion centered on cyclical global cataclysms, elite survival strategies, and suppressed ancient technologies. One user argued that "destruction is inevitable" due to humanity's inability to evolve alongside technology, suggesting that "monogamy slows genetic progress." Others speculated that billionaires like Elon Musk seek to escape Earth, with one stating, "Elon is a fool, it affects every planet in the solar system." The pyramids were proposed as ancient bunkers or energy devices, with claims they encode "astronomical dates and the size of the earth." Some accused elites of hoarding knowledge, with one declaring, "they are lying, they are keeping crucial information away from me." Conspiratorial themes included solar events triggering disasters, with warnings like "the solar rays from the event will make the earth's core spin faster." Others dismissed such theories, with one asserting, "No previous civ has ever reached our tech levels." The debate oscillated between fatalism and defiance, with a final call to action: "Either you do your best for humanity to make it this cycle, or you start to figure out how you best can help humanity in the next 12k cycle."
